member.name: SOCKET_ADDRESS_LIST
member.summary: The SOCKET_ADDRESS_LIST structure defines a variable-sized list of transport addresses.

member.name: SOCKET_ADDRESS_LIST.iAddressCount
member.summary: The number of transport addresses in the list.

summary.para: A variable-sized array of SOCKET_ADDRESS structures. The SOCKET_ADDRESS structure is defined as follows:
summary.code: typedef struct _SOCKET_ADDRESS { LPSOCKADDR lpSockaddr; INT iSockaddrLength; } SOCKET_ADDRESS, *PSOCKET_ADDRESS, *LPSOCKET_ADDRESS;
summary.para: A pointer to a buffer that contains a transport address.
The size, in bytes, of the SOCKADDR structure type that is pointed to by thelpSockaddr member.
